Fast generalized matrix decomposition (dense/sparse dispatch)

gmd_fast_cpp.Rd

Fast generalized matrix decomposition (dense/sparse dispatch)

Usage

gmd_fast_cpp(
  X,
  Q,
  R,
  k,
  tol = 1e-09,
  maxit = 1000L,
  seed = 1234L,
  topk = TRUE,
  cache = TRUE
)

Arguments

X

numeric matrix (n x p)

Q, R

constraints (weights/metrics) for rows/cols

k

number of components

tol

tolerance

maxit

maximum iterations (for compatibility, ignored in new implementation)

seed

random seed (for compatibility, ignored in new implementation)

topk

logical; use top-k symmetric eigen when available (ARPACK). Defaults to TRUE.

cache

logical; cache Cholesky factors across calls when dense. Defaults to TRUE.

On this page
